channel.title: Data on Cerebral Mastication
channel.description: Recent content in Data on Cerebral Mastication

item.title: Data... it's currency!
item.description: [caption id=“” align=“alignleft” width=“140” caption=“Sean Park”][/caption] I’m a reader of Sean Park’s blog, the Park Paradigm. It’s a good blog despite the fact that it has his face in the header and has the word ‘paradigm’ in the title. I know, I know, it’s an alliteration and that’s cool. Yes, if the domain name “MentalMastication.com” were not taken I would have had an alliteration too. But anyway, besides having a pretty face and a fancy blog, Sean’s a good thinker.
